AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Pilot's child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grows up in the family of a military pilot. [PAWN_nameDef]'s father taught {PAWN_gender ? him : her} many lessons.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: War Criminal Child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is born into the family of a fugitive deserter and a war criminal. Soon, [PAWN_nameDef]'s father dies during the chase.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: General's child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is born into the family of a cruel war hero who has seen a lot. From childhood, [PAWN_nameDef] knows how to handle weapons and obey orders.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Living shield
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is born into a gang of terrorists organizing anti-government military actions. One day [PAWN_nameDef] becomes a human shield so that {PAWN_gender ? his : her} father can leave.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Child of the trenches
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent all {PAWN_gender ? his : her} childhood in military trenches, which practically did not budge from their positions. [PAWN_nameDef] was mainly involved in cooking and treating the wounded.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Reporter's child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is born into the family of a war reporter who has been on the battlefield for most of {PAWN_gender ? his : her} life.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Desperate Soldier
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Despite {PAWN_gender ? his : her} young age, [PAWN_nameDef] took an active part in the trench war, which shook {PAWN_gender ? his : her} psyche. One day [PAWN_nameDef] leads a bayonet attack.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Peaceful demonstrator
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] advocated an early end to the terrible war in which {PAWN_gender ? his : her} world plunged. [PAWN_nameDef] spent a long time in a camp for political prisoners.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Space Station Child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on a military space station that housed biological weapons.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Army nurse
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has served the wounded on the battlefield since childhood.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Young engineer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] entered the ranks of the army as an assistant to the staff engineer, from whom {PAWN_gender ? he : she} learned how to repair equipment.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Communications engineer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Since childhood, [PAWN_nameDef] loved radio engineering and, at {PAWN_gender ? his : her} own request, entered the reserve of the army of [PAWN_nameDef]'s empire as a signalman.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Military veterinarian
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Since childhood, [PAWN_nameDef] loved radio engineering and, at {PAWN_gender ? his : her} own request, entered the reserve of the army of [PAWN_nameDef]'s empire as a signalman.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Assistant cartographer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into the family of a staff cartographer. [PAWN_nameDef]'s father taught {PAWN_gender ? him : her} to work with drawings and topographic maps.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Operator
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] entered the army as a child as an ordinary soldier of the headquarters. [PAWN_nameDef] was responsible for the coordination of bomb attacks on cities and settlements.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Military artist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is inspired by paintings of destruction and becomes a renowned military artist.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Military carpenter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] coordinates the construction of dams and repairs of bridges for the passage of the army.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Factory worker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Since childhood, [PAWN_nameDef] has been working in a military factory, producing ammunition for heavy weapons.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Trench scout
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was engaged in the delivery of classified data and conducted reconnaissance of the area.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Military postman
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was engaged in the delivery of mail in an extensive network of trenches and communicated the orders of the command to the officers.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Young sniper
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] handles the rifle well and has earned a reputation as an accurate sniper.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Young chef
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]'s task was to prepare food for {PAWN_gender ? his : her} many colleagues in the army of the industrial world.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Broken child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] could not stand the horrors of the trench war and will never be the same again.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Young partisan
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was engaged in subversive activities in the rear after the enemy occupied [PAWN_nameDef]'s city.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Intelligence agent
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was recruited by enemy agents and supplied important information to the invaders.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Erudite
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is very well-read since childhood and loves to spend time in the library.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Restless child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has earned a reputation for being hyperactive and restless.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Barman
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: As a child, [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a barman in a small cafe.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Animal lover
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] adores all living things besides humans, often preferring animals to humans.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Child of plants
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] sits for a long time in {PAWN_gender ? his : her} greenhouse, observing numerous plants and insects.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: King of drama
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] loves to be in the spotlight. This often leads to emotional conversations.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Monastery child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent all {PAWN_gender ? his : her} childhood in a mountain monastery with serious discipline.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Thinker's child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into the family of a famous thinker, having spent {PAWN_gender ? his : her} childhood reading and studying books.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Philosopher's child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into the family of a wise philosopher who taught {PAWN_gender ? him : her} the artistic language of speech.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Worker's child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a poor family of a simple worker. [PAWN_nameDef] witnessed the anarchist revolution led by {PAWN_gender ? his : her} father.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Cleaner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has been working as a janitor for almost all of {PAWN_gender ? his : her} childhood. There is only enough money for the essentials.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Young gladiator
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: From an early age, [PAWN_nameDef] fights in the stadium against people like him, as well as animals. His life depends only on {PAWN_gender ? his : her} skills.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Model
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] works as a model because of {PAWN_gender ? his : her} looks.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Terrorist child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: In {PAWN_gender ? his : her} early years, [PAWN_nameDef] witnessed many terrorist attacks and joined the paramilitary group of criminals.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Young guardsman
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a family of hereditary military servants of the royal dynasty.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Resistance symbol
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: During a difficult war, when {PAWN_gender ? his : her} faction is almost broken, [PAWN_nameDef] inspires people to fight, leading the attack.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Artist's child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was the only son in the family of a poor artist. As a child, [PAWN_nameDef] showed {PAWN_gender ? his : her} talent by allowing the family to get rich.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Quiet child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a quiet child. Even too quiet.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Captain's child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into the family of a ship captain, having spent most of {PAWN_gender ? his : her} childhood at sea.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Admiral's child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into the family of an admiral of the navy and gained a lot of knowledge by communicating with {PAWN_gender ? his : her} father.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Topographer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] disliked violence, so [PAWN_nameDef] preferred cartography to military service.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Pirate's child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is born on a pirate warship, which is part of a large pirate fleet. From childhood, [PAWN_nameDef] knows how to handle weapons and cannons.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Rebel soldier
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is called up early for military service, but {PAWN_gender ? he : she} revolts and goes to prison.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Traitor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] betrayed {PAWN_gender ? his : her} commander by surrendering to the enemy army. Enemies take possession of important information, and {PAWN_gender ? his : her} faction is defeated.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Prisoner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is imprisoned by mistake, which destroys {PAWN_gender ? his : her} personality forever.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Hostage
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was captured while walking through the city, demanding an impressive ransom. [PAWN_nameDef] was able to escape from captivity only after a few years.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Remote identity
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] doesn't remember anything about {PAWN_gender ? his : her} past. In fact, only a shell remained of {PAWN_gender ? him : her}.
